title: Game Scoop Episode 523
description: New Nintendo Switch models, Sony's State of Play, Apple Arcade, Lord of the Rings: Golem, and more. This week's song is "Vectorbeam" off Daemon's album Beyond the Darkness.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: New Nintendo Switch models, Sony's State of Play, Apple Arcade, Lord of the Rings: Golem, and more. This week's song is "Vectorbeam" off Daemon's album Beyond the Darkness.
